articles.description: Brandon Smith may have played his last game for Melbourne with the Storm shopping the hooker around to several NRL clubs.
articles.content:
Brandon Smith may have played his last game for Melbourne with the Storm shopping the hooker around to several NRL clubs.

articles.title: Titans star suffers setback with knee injury - NRL News - Zero Tackle
articles.description: The Origin forward is among five Gold Coast players currently sidelined.
articles.content:
Gold Coast forward Tino Fa'asuamaleaui will be sidelined for "a couple of weeks" after sustaining a knee injury at training.
